Interface ILoginDatabase

All Known Implementing Classes:
DBOccasionalConnection, DBSubscriberConnection
public interface ILoginDatabase
The ILoginDatabase interface defines the formal contract for all database operations related to user authentication and guest registration.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    registerOccasional(String username, String phone, String email)
    Registers a new occasional customer in the database.
    int
    verifyOccasional(String username, String contactInfo)
    Verifies an occasional guest's credentials based on their chosen identity.
    int
    verifySubscriber(long subID)
    Verifies a registered subscriber's credentials.

  • Method Details

    • verifySubscriber

      int verifySubscriber(long subID)
      Verifies a registered subscriber's credentials.
      Parameters:
      subID - The unique numeric identifier assigned to the subscriber.
      Returns:
      The internal system 'userId' (int) or -1 if authentication fails.

    • verifyOccasional

      int verifyOccasional(String username, String contactInfo)
      Verifies an occasional guest's credentials based on their chosen identity.
      Parameters:
      username - The guest's unique username.
      contactInfo - The registered phone number or email associated with the guest.
      Returns:
      The internal system 'userId' (int) or -1 if authentication fails.

    • registerOccasional

      boolean registerOccasional(String username, String phone, String email)
      Registers a new occasional customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The desired username for the new guest.
      phone - The guest's mobile phone number.
      email - The guest's email address.
      Returns:
      true if successful; false otherwise.
